meanings.sent1: The cells divided lobularly, forming distinct sections.
meanings.sent2: The tumor grew lobularly, spreading in small, rounded clusters.
meanings.sent3: The cake was sliced lobularly, creating cute mini portions.
meanings.sent4: The music notes floated lobularly in the air, creating a harmonious melody.
meanings.sent5: The snowflakes fell lobularly, covering the ground in delicate patterns.
